companyInfo.name: Notion
companyInfo.size: Enterprise (serving millions of users from individuals to Fortune 100 companies)

implementation.useCase: Notion integrated Claude to power AI features across its platform, including Q&A through RAG, improved search, AI Connectors, and a unified AI assistant that helps users find information faster, automate busywork, and boost productivity within their workspaces.
implementation.problem: Knowledge workers spending excessive time on tedious tasks like searching for information, writing/editing content, and data entry instead of focusing on high-value strategic work.
implementation.implementationTime: Not mentioned specifically, though described as 'seamless' and 'as simple as changing a flag and doing some offline evaluations'

metrics.metric: reduction in time spent searching for information at Osaka Gas (company with approximately 3,000 employees)
metrics.sourceText: Osaka Gas, with approximately 3,000 employees, estimates a 35% reduction in time spent searching for information

metrics.metric: saved per search at Remote.com across 300 daily Q&A queries
metrics.sourceText: Remote.com, with around 1,400 employees, saves an estimated 10 minutes per search and executes 300 Q&A queries per day

metrics.metric: annual savings for dbt Labs by eliminating the need for additional enterprise AI or search tools
metrics.sourceText: For companies like dbt Labs, this comprehensive functionality has translated to over $35k in annual savings by eliminating the need for additional enterprise AI or search tools.

metrics.metric: average number of questions per day asked by Notion users who use Q&A
metrics.sourceText: Notion users who use Q&A ask an average of 2.7 questions per day, with a majority reporting they save at least 5 minutes of work time per question.

metrics.metric: work time saved per question for a majority of users
metrics.sourceText: Notion users who use Q&A ask an average of 2.7 questions per day, with a majority reporting they save at least 5 minutes of work time per question.

metrics.metric: daily usage of AI assistant by new employees during onboarding
metrics.sourceText: The AI assistant powered by Claude has has proven particularly transformative for employee onboarding. "When someone new joins the company, they use it 10-20 times daily," Last shared. "We get consistent feedback that it's amazingly useful for the first few weeks."
Notion is also using prompt caching to reduce costs by 90% and latency by up to 85%.
Notion is also using prompt caching to reduce costs by 90% and latency by up to 85%.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude's conversational tone creates more natural, helpful interactions
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: The team was particularly impressed by Claude's reasoning and instruction-following capabilities, conversational tone that creates natural, helpful interactions, and balanced approach to safety and refusals.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: New employees find the AI assistant particularly valuable during their first few weeks
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: The AI assistant powered by Claude has has proven particularly transformative for employee onboarding. "When someone new joins the company, they use it 10-20 times daily," Last shared. "We get consistent feedback that it's amazingly useful for the first few weeks."

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude delivered better performance compared to previous AI tools
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Compared to previous AI tools, Claude delivered higher helpfulness ratings and improved task completion rates.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Users complete tasks more successfully with Claude compared to previous AI tools
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Compared to previous AI tools, Claude delivered higher helpfulness ratings and improved task completion rates.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude maintains performance during peak usage periods across millions of users
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Claude's advanced generative AI capabilities scale for Notion's millions of users during peak periods without compromising performance, ensuring consistent user satisfaction as its customer base expands.

outcomes.timeToValue: Not specifically mentioned, though onboarding benefits are realized immediately with new employees
outcomes.roi: Specific ROI not mentioned beyond the individual metrics for customer savings

technicalDetails.architecture: Notion integrated Claude with their retrieval system throughout the platform, using prompt caching to optimize performance and costs
technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Notion uses prompt caching to reduce costs and latency while maintaining quality
technicalDetails.solutions: Implemented prompt caching to reduce costs by 90% and latency by up to 85%
technicalDetails.scale: Serves millions of users, with Q&A users asking an average of 2.7 questions per day
